scripts.test: echo '=> running tests' && ./node_modules/.bin/jasmine-node spec && echo '=> tests passed'
scripts.minify:js: npm run minify:middleware && npm run minify:app && npm run minify:models
scripts.minify:middleware: echo '=> minify:middleware' && mkdir -p ./dist/js/src/middleware && mv ./src/middleware/index.js ./src/middleware/index.js.tmp && uglifyjs ./src/middleware/*.js -o ./dist/js/src/middleware/index.js --source-map ./dist/js/src/middleware/index.js.map && mv ./src/middleware/index.js.tmp ./src/middleware/index.js && echo '=> minify:middleware completed'
scripts.minify:models: echo '=> minify:models' && mkdir -p ./dist/js/src/models && mv ./src/models/index.js ./src/models/index.js.tmp && uglifyjs ./src/models/*.js -o ./dist/js/src/models/index.js --source-map ./dist/js/src/models/index.js.map && mv ./src/models/index.js.tmp ./src/models/index.js && echo '=> minify:models completed'
scripts.minify:app: echo '=> minify:app' && uglifyjs ./src/*.js -o ./dist/js/src/app.min.js --source-map ./dist/js/src/app.js.map && echo '=> minify:app completed'
scripts.build: echo 'Running build....' && npm run clean && npm install && tsc && npm run build:dir && npm run test && npm run minify:js
